species.name: nidorino
descriptions: An aggressive Pokémon that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.
It has a violent disposition and stabs foes with its horn, which oozes poison upon impact.
It is easily agitated and uses its horn for offense as soon as it notices an attacker.
It raises its big ears to check its surroundings. If it senses anything, it attacks immediately.
Its horn contains venom. If it stabs an enemy with the horn, the impact makes the poison leak out.

abilities.name: poison-point
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: rivalry
abilities.effect: Increases damage inflicted to 1.25× against Pokémon of the same gender, but decreases damage to 0.75× against the opposite gender.

abilities.name: hustle
abilities.effect: Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5× damage, but decreases their accuracy to 0.8×.
